DOC.brief_summary: The laser areas treated with biocellulose sheet from coconut juice containing anti-hyperpigmentation agent ("biocellulose mask", "Farhorm速") heal faster than vaseline ointment which is a standard treatment.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Biocellulose Sheet Containing Anti-hyperpigmentation Agent ("Biocellulose Mask", "Farhorm速") in Patients Receiving Laser Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: Volar surface at upper arm (2X2 cm) on both sides were treated with semi ablative, 1,550 nm Erbium: glass fractional laser. Biocellulose sheet from coconut juice containing anti-hyperpigmentation agent ("biocellulose mask","Farhorm速")was applied for 20 min on one side and the other side was treated with vaseline ointment. The redness, skin hydration and skin pigmentation were evaluated at that area before laser, immediately after laser and after applying the treatment. These parameters were compared between treatment (area treated with Biocellulose sheet from coconut juice containing anti-hyperpigmentation agent, "biocellulose mask", "Farhorm速") and control (vaseline ointment).
DOC.criteria: Age 2050 years old No skin problem such as inflammation, fresh wounds Not receive laser treatment during last 3 months No history of smoking or alcohol drinking No allergy to licorice extract, Vit C, Vit E, arbutin or stearyl glycyrrhetinate Willing to participate in this study and can comply with study protocol Has history of hyperallergic reaction Has wound(s) on face during last 4 weeks Has history of eczema, psoriasis during last 6 months Has laser treatment during last month Use steroid, antibiotic, antiinflammatory drugs or antihistamine during 3 days before recruiting Had major surgery during last 12 months Has history of cancer during last 12 months Pregnant or lactation
